item.title: Tips: Pavian Load Large Data
item.description: Pavian is a interactive browser application for analyzing and visualization metagenomics classification results from classifiers such as Kraken, Centrifuge and MetaPhlAn. Here are a few tips for Pavian to work with large data. 1. Error: Maximum upload size exceeded E.g., Maximum upload 50M files for Pavian, simple input: pavian::runApp(port=5000, maxUploadSize=50*1024^2) # Or pavian::runApp(port=5000, maxUploadSize="50M") Besides M (megabyte), B (byte), K (kilobyte) and G (gigabyte) also supported. This option is defined in the script runApp.
